attributes.action: to commence without delay the a5-m1 link as approved by h m treasury on 9th december 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Town has waited patiently for over 40 years for this bypass. it must start without any further delays, before the town becomes completely gridlocked.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to commence without delay the a5-m1 link as approved by h m treasury on 9th december 2009.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=DunstableBypass


Her Majesty's Government
